docstring.long_description: To multiply a scalar, use the MULTIPLY block.
docstring.short_description: Take two input matrices, multiply them (by dot product), and return the result.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: The input matrix to be multiplied to input b.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: The input matrix to be multiplied to input a.

returns.description: The matrix result from the matrix multiplication.
